Element.Name: Document Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Process Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: CV identifier
Element.Description: Document identifier for referencing the document instance.

Element.Name: Issue Date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued, format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Issue Time
Element.Description: The time on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Doffin Reference
Element.Description: The Doffin Reference number.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the contracting authority.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting authority.

Element.Name: Contact Name
Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Name: Contact Telephone Number
Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the economic operator or the candidate.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The party name of the Contracting Authority.

Element.Name: Contact Name
Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Name: Contact Telephone Number
Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Education identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Education degree
Element.Description: The candidate's education degree. Use codelist eduDegree.

Element.Name: Educational Subject Area
Element.Description: The candidate's educational subject area. Use codelist subArea.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The period the candidate completed the education.

Element.Name: Start date
Element.Description: Education start date.

Element.Name: End date
Element.Description: Education end date.

Element.Name: Educational documentation
Element.Description: The candidate's educational documentation

Element.Name: Registration type
Element.Description: The type of registration required from EHF CV-request, e.g. HPR-number.

Element.Name: Registration number
Element.Description: Specific number of the registration type.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A binary large object containing an attached document. Base 64 encoded.

Element.Name: Education documentation URI
Element.Description: Education documentation URI reference, e.g. from vitnem√•lsportalen

Element.Name: Contact Name
Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Name: Contact person's role
Element.Description: Contact person's role.

Element.Name: Contact Telephone Number
Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Education Reference linked to CV Request
Education reference Identifier
Element.Description: Education reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Course identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Course title
Element.Description: The specific name of the course.

Element.Name: Course type
Element.Description: The specific name of the course expressed as code.

Element.Name: Course version
Element.Description: The version of the course.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The period the course has been completed.

Element.Name: Course version
Element.Description: Course start date.

Element.Name: Course version
Element.Description: Course end date. This may be a date in future.

Element.Name: Course supplier party
Element.Description: The party who organized the course.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the supplier party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The party name of the supplier party.

Element.Name: Supplier Party Email Address
Element.Description: Supplier party's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Supplier party country
Element.Description: Supplier party's country of registration.

Element.Name: Course documentation
Element.Description: The candidate's course documentation

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A binary large object containing an attached document. Base 64 encoded.

Element.Name: Course documentation URI
Element.Description: Course documentation URI reference.

Element.Name: Course Reference linked to CV Request
Course reference Identifier
Element.Description: Course reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Certification identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Certification title
Element.Description: The specific name of the course.

Element.Name: Certification type
Element.Description: The specific name of the certfication expressed as code.

Element.Name: Course version
Element.Description: The version of the certification.

Element.Name: Cerrtification valid date
Element.Description: The date certication is valid to.

Element.Name: Course supplier party
Element.Description: The party who organized the certification.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the supplier party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The party name of the supplier party.

Element.Name: Supplier Party Email Address
Element.Description: Supplier party's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Supplier party country
Element.Description: Supplier party's country of registration.

Element.Name: Course documentation
Element.Description: The candidate's certification documentation

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A binary large object containing an attached document. Base 64 encoded.

Element.Name: Certification documentation URI
Element.Description: Certification documentation URI reference.

Element.Name: Certification reference linked to CV Request
Certification reference Identifier
Element.Description: Certification reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Language Identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Language
Element.Description: The specific language. Use code list ISO639.

Element.Name: Oral skill
Element.Description: Oral skill related to the specific language. Use EU Global Scale code list.

Element.Name: Weitten skill
Element.Description: Written skill related to the specific language. Use EU Global Scale code list.

Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Description: Contact person's role.

Element.Name: Contact Telephone Number
Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Language skills reference linked to CV Request
Language skills reference Identifier
Element.Description: Language skills reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Project experience Identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Experience type
Element.Description: The experience type, expressed by using classification of occupations code.

Element.Name: Industry type
Element.Description: The industry type related to project experience. Use code list NACE.

Element.Name: Work place
Element.Description: A project experience related to a work place, i.e. country. Use code list ISO3166.

Element.Name: Job sector
Element.Description: A project experience related to a job sector. Use code list sector.

Element.Name: COmpany party information
Element.Description: General information about the company.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the company party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The party name of the company party.

Element.Name: Project experience start date
Element.Description: Project experience start date.

Element.Name: Project experience end date
Element.Description: Project experience end date.

Element.Name: Project experience description
Element.Description: Detailed description about the project experience

Element.Name: Position percent
Element.Description: The candidate's work percentage in the specific project experience.

Element.Name: Role
Element.Description: The candidate's role in the project experience.

Element.Name: Activities
Element.Description: Detailed description about what the cancdidate have done in the specific project experience. E.g. Finance analysis

Element.Name: Experience value
Element.Description: Detailed description about the project value

Element.Name: Project participation
Element.Description: The candidate's project participation, stated as months.

Element.Name: Project size
Element.Description: The total size of the project, stated as months.

Element.Name: Project Value
Element.Description: Total value of the project.

Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Description: Contact person's role.

Element.Name: Contact Telephone Number
Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Education reference linked to EHF CV Request requirement about education
Education reference Identifier
Element.Description: Education reference identifier connected to EHF CV request requirements about the education. This element need to be stated only if RelevantExperience element is stated in education-part of EHF CV Request.

Element.Name: Project experience reference linked to CV Request
Project experience reference Identifier
Element.Description: Project experience reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Work experience Identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Position level
Element.Description: The candidate's position level. Use code list.

Element.Name: Industry type
Element.Description: The industry type related to work experience. Use code list NACE.

Element.Name: Work place
Element.Description: A work experience related to a work place, i.e. country. Use code list ISO3166.

Element.Name: Job sector
Element.Description: A work experience related to a job sector. Use code list sector.

Element.Name: Company party information
Element.Description: General information about the company.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the company party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The party name of the company party.

Element.Name: Work experience start date
Element.Description: Work experience start date.

Element.Name: Work experience end date
Element.Description: Work experience end date.

Element.Name: Work experience description
Element.Description: Detailed description about the work experience

Element.Name: Position percent
Element.Description: Worked percentage in the specific work experience.

Element.Name: Role
Element.Description: The candidate's role in the work experience.

Element.Name: Activities
Element.Description: Detailed description about what the cancdidate have done in the specific project experience. E.g. statistical analysis
Element.Value: Statistical analysis by using R and Python.

Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Description: Education reference identifier connected to EHF CV request requirements about the education. This element need to be stated only if RelevantExperience element is stated in education-part of EHF CV Request.

Element.Description: Project experience reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Clearance Identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Clearance title
Element.Description: The specific name of the clearance.

Element.Name: Clearance type
Element.Description: The specific name of the clearance expressed as code.

Element.Name: Clearance level
Element.Description: The level of the specific clearance.

Element.Name: Clearance expiration date
Element.Description: The clearance's expiration date.

Element.Name: Clearance documentation
Element.Description: The candidate's clearance documentation

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A binary large object containing an attached document. Base 64 encoded.

Element.Name: Clearance documentation URI
Element.Description: Clearance documentation URI reference.

Element.Name: Clearance description
Element.Description: A description of why the candidate has not been cleared, and whether it is possible to be cleared before the job begins.

Element.Name: CLearance reference linked to CV Request
Clearance reference Identifier
Element.Description: Clearance reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Reference Identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Party information
Element.Description: General information about the party.

Element.Name: Electronic Address Identifier
Element.Description: The electronic address identifier of the party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The party name of the party.

Element.Name: Relation type
Element.Description: Relation type to the reference. State e.g. role, positionlevel, profession

Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Reference Identifier
Element.Description: Reference identifier connected to CV request references.

Element.Name: Skills identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Skill title
Element.Description: The specific name of the skill.

Element.Name: Skill type
Element.Description: The specific name of the skill expressed as code.

Element.Name: Skill version
Element.Description: The version of the skill.

Element.Name: Skill last practice
Element.Description: Last time the skill was practiced.

Element.Name: Skill minimum length practice
Element.Description: How long the skill was practiced continously, state the minimum length as months.

Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Description: Contact person's role.

Element.Name: Contact Telephone Number
Element.Description: Contact person's telephone number.

Element.Name: Contact Email Address
Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Skills reference Identifier
Element.Description: A reference to where the skill was applied. A reference to education, course, certification, work experience, project experience or interest.

Element.Name: Skills reference linked to CV Request
Skills reference Identifier
Element.Description: Skills reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Personal skills identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Personal skill title
Element.Description: The specific name of the personal skill.

Element.Name: Personal skill type
Element.Description: The specific name of the personal skill expressed as code.

Element.Description: Contact person's name.

Element.Description: Contact person's e-mail address.

Element.Name: Personal skills reference linked to CV Request
Personal skills reference Identifier
Element.Description: Personal skills reference identifier connected to CV request.

Element.Name: Personal information identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Candidate name
Element.Description: The candidate's full name.

Element.Name: Candidate date of birth
Element.Description: The candidate's date of birth.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Additional street line
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City Name
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2

Element.Name: Social media identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Social media title
Element.Description: The specific name of the social media.

Element.Name: Social media type
Element.Description: The specific name of the social media expressed as code.

Element.Name: Attached picure of candidate
Element.Description: A binary large object containing an attached document. Base 64 encoded.

Element.Name: Socail medium URI
Element.Description: A specific sociam medium URI reference

Element.Name: Interest identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Interest descrption
Element.Description: A textual description of the specific interest.

Element.Name: Additional information identifier
Element.Description: Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents.

Element.Name: Additional information title
Element.Description: A short title of the additional information.

Element.Name: Additional information descrption
Element.Description: A textual description of the specific information.
Element.Value: Worked as footballcoach for young girls.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A binary large object containing an attached document. Base 64 encoded.

Element.Name: Documentation URI
Element.Description: Additional information documentation URI reference.
